thread.title: BRIEF-Atos signs contract with leading electricity provider in Serbia
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Atos signs contract with leading electricity provider in Serbia | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Atos signs contract with leading electricity provider in Serbia
text:
Sept 22 Atos SE :
* Atos signs major smart metering contract with EPS - leading electricity provider in Serbia
* The smart meters and supporting technology and infrastructure are expected to be delivered by end of 2017 in accordance with EU directive 2020 Source text for Eikon: [ID: nHUG1NGBlx] Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
